text: Klada () is a small village above Želimlje in the Municipality of Škofljica in central Slovenia. The municipality is part of the traditional region of Lower Carniola and is now included in the Central Slovenia Statistical Region.Škofljica municipal site Hallstatt culture-era tumuli identified near the settlement are believed to be part of the burial ground of a prehistoric Iron Age settlement in nearby Golo.Slovenian Ministry of Culture register of national heritage reference number ešd 14912 ==References== ==External links== *Klada on Geopedia Category:Populated places in the Municipality of Škofljica
title: Klada, Škofljica
